item.title: Arranging Coins
item.description: So this is probably the simplest weekly question out there if you know the math required. I will just write down my thoughts so I know how I approached the problem later on, and not what the solution is per se. Problem: Link: https://leetcode.com/problems/arranging-coins/ Statement: You have n coins, and you want to build a staircase with these coins. The staircase consists of k rows, where ith row has exactly i coins.
